abstract: Big, but not unwieldy, Nokia’s Lumia 1020 cellphone takes excellent photos, and is essentially a decent camera grafted onto a phone. But you’ll have to make peace with its apps and its Windows operating system.
snippet: Big, but not unwieldy, Nokia’s Lumia 1020 cellphone takes excellent photos, and is essentially a decent camera grafted onto a phone. But you’ll have to make peace with its apps and its Windows operating system.
lead_paragraph: For years, every decent photo from a cellphone has earned the same faint praise: “That’s a great picture! You know, for a cellphone.”

headline.main: The Lumia 1020, a Great Camera Grafted to an Oddball Phone
headline.print_headline: A Camera That Stuns, A Phone That Puzzles
